akn:section.akn:heading: Recommendations on financial stability and management responsibility.

akn:content.akn:p: In general. — The Authority may at any time submit recommendations to the Mayor, the Council, the President, and Congress on actions the District government or the Federal Government may take to ensure compliance by the District government with a financial plan and budget or to otherwise promote the financial stability, management responsibility, and service delivery efficiency of the District government, including recommendations relating to:
Response to recommendations for actions within authority of District government. —
Implementation of rejected recommendations by Authority. —
Additional power to issue orders, rules, and regulations. —
